bots.description: The botlist with built-in GitHub integration

servers.description: The server list with built-in GitHub integration

locale.pleasehelp: Are you a good translator? Click here.

edit.title: Add a bot
edit.notice: When you are finished, click the "Create a pull request" button to publish to GitHub, or click "Export" to see the file you are about to create.
edit.default:
# Title

This is a cool bot that you should accept.
Reasons include:

- Being awesome
- Not being un-awesome
- The prefix can be changed to !

<!--
  Stan LOONA
  Stan Talent
-->

application_id.title: Bot OAuth ID
application_id.small: Leave empty if you do not need one

bot_support.title: Support URL
bot_support.small: Leave this field empty if you don't like helping people

bot_nsfw.title: NSFW
bot_nsfw.isnt: NSFW commands are not a major part of this bot
bot_nsfw.is: The bot avatar is NSFW, and/or the bot is NSFW orientated

bot_description.title: Description
bot_description.placeholder: This bot allows you to do magic.
bot_description.small: The front page only allows 60 characters to be displayed.

github.title: GitHub Repository
github.small: Leave empty if you do not have a GitHub repository for your bot

modal.title: Create a pull request
modal.description: Please enter any comments you would like to make

modal.title: Export
modal.description: Enter the contents into GitHub manually to continue
